title: COPPA, YouTube and a Creepy Cartoon
itunes:title: COPPA, YouTube and a Creepy Cartoon
description:
When Kris Straub uploaded a creepy animated short to YouTube in 2018, he indicated that it was for audiences 18 and older. So why did YouTube's AI overrule Straub to say the video is suitable for kids? We look at COPPA and how it has affected YouTube.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
When Kris Straub uploaded a creepy animated short to YouTube in 2018, he indicated that it was for audiences 18 and older. So why did YouTube's AI overrule Straub to say the video is suitable for kids? We look at COPPA and how it has affected YouTube.

itunes:keywords: Kris Straub, Local58TV, horror, YouTube, kids, children, video, COPPA, Children's Online Privacy Protection Act, monetization, targeted advertising, ads, FTC
